post.title: I Tried out Flutter for Mobile Apps
post.summary: I have created simple app for Android using Flutter. In this project basic features of Flutter framework are implemented. Also, some native Android API is used.
post.content:
I have created simple app for Android using Flutter. In this project basic features of Flutter framework are implemented. Also, some native Android API is used.
